doc:
Dennis Waterman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dennis_Waterman 0 Dennis Waterman (born 24 February 1948) is an English actor and singer, best known for his tough-guy roles in television series including The Sweeney, Minder and New Tricks. His acting career spanned almost 60 years, starting with childhood roles in film and theatre, and including adult roles in film, television, and West End theatre. He was notable for the range of roles he played, including horror (Scars of Dracula), adventure (Colditz), comedy (Fair Exchange), comedy-drama (Minder), musical (Windy City) and sports (The World Cup: A Captain's Tale), as well as police TV series such as The Sweeney. He appeared in 28 films. Dennis_Waterman ( born 24_February_1948 ) is an_English_actor_and_singer , best_known for his_tough-guy_roles in television_series including The_Sweeney_,_Minder_and_New_Tricks . His_acting_career spanned almost_60_years , starting with childhood_roles in film_and_theatre , and including_adult_roles in film_,_television , and West_End_theatre . He appeared in 28_films .
